> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEvTOmKR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-22T23:34:50.356+0000)
>
> "Fleece Teenagers" Oh god that sounds like some sort of weird horror movie.

Eewww

I like that they are actually listening and trying to do something good, but it's not enough.

1. I don't care about some "emotes" that are now free, if they cost something beforehand, I sure as hell weren't ever gonna buy them.
2. So apparently we still get the same amount of BE per capsule but it's tuned so we don't get two of the same shards now? Sorry but I never saw anyone complaining about getting multiple shards, what we were complaining about is the AMOUNT we got per level up.
3. FWOTD now resets 2 HOURS less?? Wow such a big difference, now instead of it resetting at 6am for me it now resets at 4am? Nice, TOO BAD I'M STILL ASLEEP. Literally a useless change for me.

TL;DR;
List of actual changes:
FWotD now resets every 20 hours instead of every 22 hours.
Emotes for leveling no longer cost BE (because it's not fair for only veterans to have them)

List of pretend changes:
We are changing the 90 BE shards for 90 BE.... because reasons damn you.

>But what about the mastery level? Question Asked by Forerdow on the other topic

.

>The BE cost is the "same" because we multiplied it by 6.5 to go with the increased BE you receive, let's not acknowledge the fact that you don't receive that 6.5x BE, and that a lot of it goes to champions now.
